mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_CHECK_DP_DETAIL_SPECIAL (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
check_plan_no ,
check_no ,
dept_id ,
dept_no ,
ass_id ,
ass_no ,
ass_card_no ,
acc_amount ,
price ,
add_depre ,
add_depre_month ,
cur_money ,
fore_money ,
p_reason ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{check_plan_no} ,
#{check_no} ,
#{dept_id} ,
#{dept_no} ,
#{ass_id} ,
#{ass_no} ,
#{ass_card_no} ,
#{acc_amount} ,
#{price} ,
#{add_depre} ,
#{add_depre_month} ,
#{cur_money} ,
#{fore_money} ,
#{p_reason}
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, check_plan_no, check_no, dept_id, dept_no, ass_id, ass_no, ass_card_no, acc_amount, price, add_depre, add_depre_month, cur_money, fore_money, p_reason FROM ass_check_dp_detail_special WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and check_plan_no = #{check_plan_no} and check_no = #{check_no} and dept_id = #{dept_id} and dept_no = #{dept_no} and ass_id = #{ass_id} and ass_no = #{ass_no}

select t1.check_no,t1.check_plan_no,t1.check_date,t1.dept_no,t1.dept_id,t1.summary, case when t1.state = 0 then '新建' when t1.state = 1 then '审核' else '' end state,t1.note,t1.dept_no,t2.user_name,t4.dept_name from ASS_CHECK_D_SPECIAL t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.group_id = t2.group_id and t1.hos_id = t2.hos_id and t1.check_emp = t2.user_id left join hos_dept t4 on t1.group_id = t4.group_id and t1.hos_id = t4.hos_id and t1.dept_id = t4.dept_id and t4.is_stop = 0 where t1.group_id = #{group_id} AND t1.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND t1.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND t1.check_no = #{check_no}

select t1.ass_card_no,t1.ass_id,t1.ass_no,t1.acc_amount,T1.CUR_MONEY, T1.FORE_MONEY,T1.P_REASON,T1.PRICE,T1.ADD_DEPRE,t1.add_depre_month,t2.ass_name from ASS_CHECK_DP_DETAIL_SPECIAL t1 left join ass_dict t2 on t1.group_id = t2.group_id and t1.hos_id = t2.hos_id and t1.ass_id=t2.ass_id where t1.group_id = #{group_id} AND t1.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND t1.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND t1.check_no in (#{check_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
